metadata.title: CVE-2020-7919 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Go before 1.12.16 and 1.13.x before 1.13.7 (and the crypto/cryptobytepackage before 0.0.0-20200124225646-8b5121be2f68 for Go) allows attacks onclients (resulting in a panic) via a malformed X.509 certificate.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-7919` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-1.13 - 1.13.7-1ubuntu1
golang-1.13-go - 1.13.7-1ubuntu1
golang-1.13-src - 1.13.7-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

golang-1.14 - 1.14~rc1-1
golang-1.14-go - 1.14~rc1-1
golang-1.14-src - 1.14~rc1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: golang-1.13 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.13.7-1ubuntu1').
golang-1.14 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.14~rc1-1').
